articles.title: Doing Best Not To Get Involved: Lebanese Envoy On Israel-Gaza War - NDTV
articles.description: Calling the situation in West Asia 'volatile' and worrisome' due to the ongoing Israel-Hamas war, Lebanese Ambassador to India Rabie Narsh said that the country calls for a 'peaceful solution' to the conflict.
articles.content:
The envoy commended India's peacekeeping presence in Lebanon
